short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your reading and watching lists into atomic notes — learn more in less time with Samurai AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Samurai's Chrome extension is your perfect tool to cut through any content on the web – YouTube videos, Web articles or TED talks.

There are so many insightful videos and articles nowadays but not enough time to read or watch them without sacrificing other things you do.

Hack the time and learn more in less time.

SAVE CONTENT WITH EASE
When you find any content worth reading or watching  – just open the extension and send it to the Samurai app with just one click.

NOT JUST A SUMMARY
Samurai, as your loyal AI servant, will carefully read/watch the content that you send and craft the atomic notes of all the most important details and insights from it in a structured and easy-to-read manner.

YOU FINALLY LEARN AND NOT JUST SAVE
All your saved content is available in the Samurai AI mobile app (iOS and Android) in a short and insightful format that you can read 3-5 times faster than the original material.
No more infinite collecting.

Get the Samurai AI summary app at https://gosamurai.ai/ and start your journey with a free trial that allows you to samuraize up to 10 hours of any of your favourite content.
